entry.title: Modyllic 0.1.7 (beta)
entry.content: * Add IF EXISTS to all of our DROPs * Fix bugs in --only support * Fix bugs in tracking sqlmeta_exists

entry.title: Modyllic 0.1.6 (beta)
entry.content: * Stop Modyllic_Parser::partial from having a return value * Complain if no toschema is provided to sqldiff * Fix a --progress divide by zero when the source file was empty * Fix bug where a DROP DATABASE would ignore any following CREATEs * Make the SQL generator able to only output specific kinds of data * Boolean types were being treated as exactly equivalent to TINYINT and this isn't actually the case * displayError should really be a static function * Fix migration --create option * Fix bugs around when SQLMETA is created * Add support for MySQL Triggers * Fix view changeset handling

entry.title: Modyllic 0.1.5 (beta)
entry.content: * Add IF EXISTS to events. Fixes #93. * Stop using 5.3 Exception form and just rethrow non-general errors * RETURNS COLUMN assertions should allow empty result sets (#56) * Implement support for extended inserts (#88) * Fix missing is_primary attribute on columns * Improve error messages for invalid delimiters (#82)

entry.title: OLB_PDO 0.2.0 (beta)
entry.content: * Added RETRY_DEADLOCKS flag-- when it's true, we will retry deadlocked queries. * Converted Exception to PDOException * Reduced and simplified warnings relating to retries. We now log only if the first reconnect fails. Previously we retried prior to the first reconnection attempt if we had previously reconnected. * Changed retryable exception detection to use only on the error number. * Correctly throw calls to invalid methods on PDO_STH * Allow RETRIES and RETRY_DEADLOCKS to be overridden on calls to ->execute * Improved test suite with nearly 100% coverage
